name: PAPER PLANE CRAFT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The AAVEGA™ line thrower is the essential tool for water rescue & land rescue. Varied in its applications, the AAVEGA ™ can deploy a wide variety of lines to distances up to 90m, 100m, 150m, 250m. Because the AAVEGA ™ is a non-pyrotechnic line thrower, it does not require special storage, shipping, or licensing. This pneumatic line thrower replaces traditional pyrotechnic line guns with an intrinsically safe option. The system is powered by compressed air and the components can be reused, making line-throwing training an inexpensive operation.
name: WAVENOR SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Impale

idea:
We are an early stage startup in travel & hospitality sector and scaling up fast to establish a chain of backpacking hostels across the country. Since our launch in December 2018, we have launched two hostels across Mumbai, Goa and opening soon in Varanasi and our operations are EBITA positive. Our Mumbai & Goa hostels are category leaders in the markets with high user ratings on top OTA platforms like booking.com, hostelworld, makemytrip and Google hotels.

We aim to attain market leadership position by 2022-23 and have presence across 50 cities in India operating more than 2500 beds. Our Website : www.cohostels.com
name: KOVENTURA TRAVEL & HOSPITALITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We help people make fitness a habit by driving behavioral change towards fitness and providing a rich and personalized experience of working out for long lasting motivation

name: Motogarage 46 Hospitality Services Private Limited

idea:
70% of the food we eat goes to our brain , and rest in the body and in excretion. Unfortunately the food we eat is unhealthy today due to lots of processed and cooked food is available in the market . Students studying in the colleges and Corporates working in their office don't have access to raw satvic diet.

This startup is about contacting employers and providing their employees raw satvic food  and stopping the harmful culture of coffee and tea which boosts the production automatically , same with the colleges having canteens or stalls nearby and providing raw satvic diet. This is also to combat the high charging strategy of several naturopathy centres who charge a lot for just a natural detox , here you are served detox at your doorstep with least cost , same with restraunts selling processed vegetables as organic ,which is inappropriate.

Here diet contains Fruits , vegetable juices ,nuts and seeds and strictly against the meat eaters. It is also given to industrial areas where daily wage workers don't have access to fruits and vegetables .
name: Sattvic Anna
